E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1989
Subject: Carlos Baerga healing process
Carlos Baerga is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Saturday, 6/28/1989
Subject: Lonnie Smith learns new position
Lonnie Smith has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Monday, 7/14/1989
Subject: David Segui learns new position
David Segui has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Third Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Monday, 7/14/1989
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
John Martin



Date: Saturday, 7/19/1989
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
George Bell
